'''Traveler's Original Sword''' is the weapon used by the [[Traveler]]s in their opening cutscene fight against the [[Unknown God]]. An altered version is seen wielded by the [[Traveler's Sibling]] in [[Chapter I]]: Act IV - [[We Will Be Reunited]].
